      • updateImplications

        public void updateImplications()
        Overloaded method. Passes to the recursive updateImplications function with the size of the facts ArrayList

      • updateImplications

        public void updateImplications(int size)
        Overloaded method. Recursive. Updates the known facts, repeating until an iteration where no new facts are added.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the previous iterations ArrayList of facts
